scenes.background: [Monica] sighs heavily while [Bob] looks stressed, tapping his pen on the desk.
scenes.description: 'Bob is right. This is escalating quickly. Are you sure we can't convince you to get more involved?'

options.text: Let's find a middle ground. I'll be available for key decisions.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and willingness to support while maintaining some boundaries, demonstrating good perception and motivation.

options.text: Honestly, I can't take on more right now. You need to lead this.
options.analysis: You maintained strong self-regulation by setting clear boundaries, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: I'll help where I can, but you need to manage most of it.
options.analysis: You offered some assistance, showing balanced empathy and social skills, but your perception and self-regulation were not particularly high.
